content: 140 152 162 172 184 194 sts pincm *k to m sm p1* sm repeat from * to * setup round 2 k9 9 11 11 12 13 12 13 13 sts pincm m1l k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm increase round k to incm sincm m1l k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm repeat increase round another 4 times to add 12 sts in total to the front proceed to page 9 7 mc4 7-5 5 htped puc tsub mc4 9-5 7 htped puc tsub mc4 11-5 9 htped puc tsub pattern body with fba and bsrs setup round co 9 9 11 11 12 13 12 13 13 sts rm k 108 118 130 140 152 162 172 184 194 sts pincm *k to m sm p1* sm repeat from * to * bsr 1 rs k9 9 11 11 12 13 12 13 13 sts pincm m1l *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * k1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 srt bsr 2 ws *p to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * p1 1 2 2 3 3 4 4 4 srt bsr 3 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust bsr 4 rs k to incm sincm m1l k to ts kts *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * k to ts kts k4 4 6 6 8 8 10 10 10 srt bsr 5 ws *p to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * p4 4 6 6 8 8 10 10 10 srt bsr 6 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust if bust cup depth is 5 5 - 7 4 cm work increase round instructions on page 7 a total of 4 times to add another 8 sts in total to the front bust then proceed to page 9 if bust cup depth is more than 7 4cm continue as follows bsr 7 rs k to incm sincm m1l k to ts kts *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * k to ts kts k9 9 12 12 15 15 18 18 18 srt bsr 8 ws *p to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * p9 9 12 12 15 15 18 18 18 srt bsr 9 rs *k to bsrm sm* repeat from * to * a total of 2 times k to ts kts k to incm m1r sincm work sts as they appear to borm 2 short row and 2 sts added to front bust bsr 10 rs k
